com.incors.plaf.alloy.themes.custom
Class CustomThemeFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.incors.plaf.alloy.themes.custom.CustomThemeFactory
public class CustomThemeFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a very simple way for creating themes with customized colors. For creating a custom theme you only have to call the static method createTheme.

Constructor Summary
CustomThemeFactory()
           
 
Method Summary
static AlloyTheme createTheme(java.awt.Color contrastColor, java.awt.Color standardColor, java.awt.Color desktopColor, java.awt.Color selectionColor, java.awt.Color rolloverColor, java.awt.Color highlightColor)
          This method creates a customized theme with the specified colors.
static AlloyTheme createTheme(java.awt.Color contrastColor, java.awt.Color standardColor, java.awt.Color desktopColor, java.awt.Color selectionColor, java.awt.Color rolloverColor, java.awt.Color highlightColor, AlloyFontTheme fontTheme)
          This method creates a customized theme with the specified colors and font theme.

Method Detail

createTheme

public static AlloyTheme createTheme(java.awt.Color contrastColor,
                                     java.awt.Color standardColor,
                                     java.awt.Color desktopColor,
                                     java.awt.Color selectionColor,
                                     java.awt.Color rolloverColor,
                                     java.awt.Color highlightColor)
This method creates a customized theme with the specified colors.

The colors are used for the following purposes:

primaryColor color used for scrollbar thumbs, progress bars, and frame decorations
secondaryColor color used for most controls like buttons, panels etc.
desktopColor color used for the color of a desktop pane
selectionColor color used for selection indicators on radio buttons and check boxes
rolloverColor color used for the rollover indicator on buttons, radio buttons, check boxes etc.
highlightColor color used for highlighting text

createTheme

public static AlloyTheme createTheme(java.awt.Color contrastColor,
                                     java.awt.Color standardColor,
                                     java.awt.Color desktopColor,
                                     java.awt.Color selectionColor,
                                     java.awt.Color rolloverColor,
                                     java.awt.Color highlightColor,
                                     AlloyFontTheme fontTheme)
This method creates a customized theme with the specified colors and font theme.

The colors are used for the following purposes:

primaryColor color used for scrollbar thumbs, progress bars, and frame decorations
secondaryColor color used for most controls like buttons, panels etc.
desktopColor color used for the color of a desktop pane
selectionColor color used for selection indicators on radio buttons and check boxes
rolloverColor color used for the rollover indicator on buttons, radio buttons, check boxes etc.
highlightColor color used for highlighting text
